text: Akram Tawfik Elhagrasi (; born 8 November 1997) is an Egyptian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for El Gouna FC on loan from Al Ahly and the Egypt U-20.Ahram: Al Ahly boost midfield with Akram Tawfik He is a product of the ENPPI youth system. Akram is the younger brother of Abdelaziz Tawfik and Ahmed Tawfik, Egyptian international footballers. ==Honours== ===Egypt=== *Africa U-23 Cup of Nations Champions: 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Akram Tawfik at Footballdatabase * Category:1997 births Category:Al Ahly SC players Category:Living people Category:Egyptian footballers Category:Egyptian Premier League players Category:ENPPI SC players Category:El Gouna FC players Category:Egypt international footballers Category:Sportspeople from Cairo Category:Association football midfielders
title: Akram Tawfik
